name: cambrian
story: You are at Cambrian College. The president is looking for a brave hero to find the lost trophy...
nav: press 1 to take the mission, press 2 to go to the information center, and press 3 to quit the game

story: Welcome to 1910… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to 1920, and press 3 to go to the secret center

story: Welcome to 1920… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to 1930, and press 3 to go to the secret center

story: Welcome to 1930… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to 1940, and press 3 to go to the secret center

story: Welcome to 1940… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to 1950, and press 3 to go to the secret center

story: Welcome to 1950… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to 1960, and press 3 to go to the secret center

story: Welcome to 1960… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to 1970, and press 3 to go to the secret center

story: Welcome to 1970… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to 1980, and press 3 to go to the secret center

story: Welcome to 1980… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to 1990, and press 3 to go to the secret center

story: Welcome to 1990… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to 2000, and press 3 to go to the secret center

story: Welcome to 2000… Go test your answer in the secret center…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine, press 2 to pet a cute cat, and press 3 to go to the secret center

name: desert
story: The restaurant's owner is the thief… You fainted after eating bread, and she sent you to the desert… Pay $100 to get a helicopter to send you to the beach…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to the beach, and press 3 to go to the secret center

name: beach
story: You are so tired and you want to go home… Suddenly, you saw a huge '3' in the sky… What is that…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to the secret center

name: park
story: You were so excited to find the thief… However, there is a wolf, and the note was the thief's trick…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to the restuarant, and press 3 to go to the secret center

name: Alison
story: Alison: I am a superhero, and my superpower is to summon anyone… Just tell me a name…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine, press 2 to the secret center

name: secret center
story: Welcome to the testing center! Enter your answer below, and I will tell you something you want to know…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine

name: castle
story: As soon as you fly out of prison, you get lost… You land in front of a castle… Suddenly, a vampire rushes out of the castle trying to eat you. You fought to escape, but unfortunately you were bitten in the arm…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine, press 2 to go to the hospital, and press 3 to go to the secret center

name: jail
story: Oh no, it was a trap… You are in jail now… If you pay $20, a wizard can turn you into a bird…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine, press 2 to pay $20, and press 3 to go to the secret center

name: resturant
story: Are you hungry? The restaurant only has bread. Pay $10 to get one…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to desert, and press 3 to go to the secret center

name: store
story: You bought a suit. You picked up a note from the street, and it says 'go to the park'…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to the park, and press 3 to go to the secret center

name: hospital
story: Fortunately, you flew fast, and the doctor gave you serum… You will not become a vampire. But you need some clothes because you are back to yourself…
nav: press 1 to take the time machine,  press 2 to go to the store, and press 3 to go to the secret center

name: time machine
story: The thief took the trophy and ran into the time machine… The time machine happened to be set between 1910 and 2000. If you want to find her, search from 1910 to 2000…
nav: press 1 to 1910, press 2 to go to 1950, and press 3 to go to Cambrian College.

name: information center
story: To find the thief, you need to collect clues by playing games year by year… You will know what to do after you have enough information...
nav: press 1 to take the time machine

name: win
nav: Take the password 'ANA1001Alison', and go to the password site of this link. You will be surprised :) https://FindTheTrophy.alison0412.repl.co

name: lose
story: It is ok…
nav: Take the password 'ANA1001Alison', and go to the password site of this link. You will be surprised :) https://FindTheTrophy.alison0412.repl.co
